title: 5 Best K-Beauty Products According to the Beauty Industry [PHOTOS] – WWD
text: K-beauty may have hit the mainstream consumer years ago, but industry voters prove the products are here to stay. Whether it be the persistent popularity of Glass Skin, or an extra emphasis on ingredients and technology, see the six best K-beauty products voted on in WWD Beauty Inc’s 100 Greatest Skin Care of All Time. Belif has sold more than 4 million Aqua Bombs, and its sister product, Moisturizing Bomb, since launch. More than 50 watermelons per day are required to produce the formula. Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask, $22. With 12 sold-out batches and a 25,000-person waitlist after launch, this jumpstarted the glass skin movement. This has won eight awards since its launch.
